Apache-vi Modules¶

av_parser Module¶

av_parser.browser_number(log_path='../data/access.laii-8.log')[source]¶

browser_number(log_path=default_default_log_path) searches in the log file for the presence of browsers and count how much there’s in it

Parameters

log_path (str) – Path of the log file

Returns

Searches which and how many browsers were connected with the log files

Return type

dict

av_parser.connection_month(date_dict, switch=True)[source]¶

connection_week(date_dict, switch=True) uses the dict sent by the connection_number() function and returns the connections per month. If the switch is False, it returns the ISO number of it instead of the name of the month

Parameters

  • date_dict (dict) – {day: nb_connections}

  • switch (bool) – Returns month by name or by ISO Format

Returns

Returns connections per month

Return type

dict

av_parser.connection_number(log_path='../data/access.laii-8.log')[source]¶

connection_number(log_path=default_log_path) searches how many times and when a connection has been done

Parameters

log_path (str) – Path of the log file

Returns

Searches when and how many times a connection has been done in the log file

Return type

dict

av_parser.connection_week(date_dict)[source]¶

connection_week(date_dict) uses the dict sent by the connection_number() function and returns the connections per week the week returned is the week ISO number provided by isocalendar()

Parameters

date_dict (dict) – {day: nb_connections}

Returns

Returns connections per week

Return type

dict

diagram.make_all(dict_week, dict_month, nav_dict, output)[source]¶

make_all(dict_week, output): calls every graph function to make all graphs in one time.

Parameters

  • dict_week (dict) – pa.connection_week(date_dict)

  • dict_month (dict) – pa.connection_month(date_dict, True)

  • nav_dict (dict) – path of the graph file

  • output (str) – output path

Returns

returns every graphs.

Return type

img

diagram.month_graph(dict_month, output)[source]¶

month_graph(dict_month, output) uses the dict sent by the connection_number() function and returns the connections per month in a graph

Parameters

  • dict_month (dict) – pa.connection_month(date_dict, True)

  • output (str) – output path

Returns

save a histogram of all the connections of the month.

Return type

img

diagram.nav_graph(nav_dict, output)[source]¶

nav_graph(nav_dict, output) create a pie chart to display the number of browsers used

Parameters

  • output (str) – output path

Returns

save a pie chart with all the browsers and their number of connections

  • output (str) – output path

html_creator Module¶

Website module creator

html_creator.html_creator(log_length, output_dir)[source]¶

html_creator(log_length, output_dir) uses the {output_dir_img} sent by the diagram.py function and returns return the web page.

Parameters

html_creator – log_length, output_dir)

Returns

returns a web page with a index.html and a style.css
